meanings.definition: Not given up or transferred to another party
meanings.sent1: The tribe's unceded land remained under their control.
meanings.sent2: The unceded territory was fiercely protected by the indigenous community.
meanings.sent3: The unceded land was like a treasure chest that no one could open.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the unceded boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The concept of unceded land was crystal clear to everyone in the village.

meanings.definition: Not relinquished or surrendered by treaty or agreement
meanings.sent1: The unceded rights of the group were respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The unceded territory had never been signed away.
meanings.sent3: The unceded agreement was written in invisible ink.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty to the unceded cause was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The unceded status of the land was a symbol of independence.
